div.bibl: Dziennik Zwiazkowy, Oct. 22, 1908. A LIBERAL GIFT

body.p: The recently opened Polish Peoples' University, is expanding very successfully. A gas movie projector was donated the other day by Dr. Jankowski of So. Chicago. Mrs. Felicia Modrzejski, wife of the famous engineer, who heard of the intended purchase of this projector which was necessary for illustrated, educational lectures, offered a donation of $100.00 for its purchase. This great donation will aid materially in the progress of the University.
